title: Stem Plot Visualization with Python
description: The stem plot is a type of plot used in data visualization. It is used to plot vertical lines from a baseline to the y-coordinate and places a marker at the tip. In this lab, we will learn how to use the stem plot function in Python's Matplotlib library.

meta.title: Python Data Visualization | Stem Plot Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to use the stem plot function in Python's Matplotlib library for data visualization. Explore the basics of this powerful data visualization technique.
meta.keywords: Python, Data Visualization, Stem Plot, Matplotlib, Numpy
